Description.Text: Other amenities/services: rooms with heating, music, direct dial phone, safe box, iron and ironing board, veranda. Mini market, dry cleaning, exchange, mail, fax service, tickets, car-motobike hire, 24-hour taxi service, babysiting, hairdresser. Conference room capacity: 3 rooms for 700 persons.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: the hotel is located in the east side of the island, 3.5km from Ermoupolis, 400m from the beach of Azolimnos, 50m from the private beach. Nearest Airport: 2.5km.
